article_title: Bring back the old-school Denver Nuggets jerseys
article_text:
As Deadspin highlighted Monday morning, Pop Chart Lab put together an incredible poster of 165 NBA jerseys over the years that features a handful of old-school Nuggets jerseys.

(For a large version of the poster, click here)

So, naturally, we here at the Denver Post conducted an in-house poll (we do important stuff here!) and the decision is unanimous: The Nuggets need to bring back the 1982 jerseys. Enough of the light blue and yellow: We want rainbows.

Agree? Disagree?

og.description: The Denver Nuggets should ditch the blue and yellow and revive the rainbow-colored jerseys of 1982.
og.title: Bring back the old-school Denver Nuggets jerseys
